attributes.action: increase the basic state pension by £20 per week.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To incease the basic state pension by £20 per week.  To also increase by £20 per week all old age pensions paid as a percentage of the basic state pension.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
